decision_conditions: This approval relates to the following proposed changes to the existing approval:

Amendments to the existing approved lorry route (LBH approval reference 75596/APP/2021/402) under Schedule 17 paragraph 21(1) of the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017, relating to the construction of the Colne Valley Viaduct and associated ancillary works and the realignment of Dews Lane.) to amend the existing approved LGV route to / from said worksites as TLRN(A40), A412, Moorfield Road, Moorhall Road, Moorhall Road Roundabout, Harvil Road (between its junctions with Moorhall Road and Dews Lane) and Dews Lane for a duration of 3 weeks: 8th of January to 28th January 2024.
The mitigation shall include regular monitoring of traffic flows along with the use of Moorhall Road/Harvil Road roundabout to ensure that safe operations are observed.
description: Non-material amendment to permission ref. 75596/APP/2021/402, dated 23-08-2023 (Request for approval of Lorry Routes under condition imposed by Schedule 17 of the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017, relating to the construction of the Colne Valley Viaduct and associated ancillary works and the realignment of Dews Lane) to amend the existing approved LGV route to / from said worksites as TLRN(A40), A412, Moorfield Road, Moorhall Road, Moorhall Road Roundabout, Harvil Road (between its junctions with Moorhall Road and Dews Lane) and Dews Lane for a duration of 3 weeks: 8th of January to 28th January 2024.
